Articles.Content:
Hello ladies and gentlemen I am DrNickdoom 

and i am in part posting hear as i tried else where and despite getting the thnaks for post message it did not show up so i though Huummm can i post els were

Welcome to the forums!

Good to have you aboard DrNickDoom.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard, cadet! Hopefully you don't turn out as villainously as your name suggests!

Your posts did not show up right away, DrNickDoom, because a new member's first few posts must be approved by a moderator, as a measure to help keep spambots out. But post a few more times, and that limitation will be automatically removed. 

And welcome to the forum. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome, doctor!

Check out any of the great videos over at Live with Mission Control!

thank you all for the welcome, 

about the moderator approval might be a good idea for the redirect to say something about it, i though i broke the forum

as for my name one of my Subs ones said he though the doom sounded a bit a bit menacing but now he just think of me as the love child of Dr Von Doom and Dr Nick Riviera witch i took as equal parts Evil mastermind and blithering idiot

> 
> equal parts Evil mastermind and blithering idiot

I think you just described most of us here.

Especially me.
